text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus rufobrunneus is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description:
The cap is 2 to 3 centimetres (0.8 to 1.2 in) in diameter.
Microscopic characteristics
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus rufobrunneus grows in clusters on the soil, and has been found in Idaho during September.
